table.name: TBL_ASSIGNMENT_LOG
table.Comment: Log for every time case assignment occur

table.name: TBL_AUTH_TOKEN
table.Comment: AUTHENTICATION TOKEN need to be called for each API. Token validity is 15 sec

table.name: TBL_BLOB
table.Comment: Store BLOB content. Will be referred from TBL_PICTURE & TBL_HERO_PROFILE

table.name: TBL_GROUP_CHAT
table.Comment: ONLY USERS IN THE SAME GROUP CAN PUSH/PULL CHAT-MESSAGE FOR THAT PARTICULAR CASE

table.name: TBL_NOTIFICATION_LOG
table.Comment: TO GET TOTAL_NEW_ALERT BY READ STATUS

table.name: TBL_RPA_LOG
table.Comment: MATCH KEYWORDS WILL BE STORED FOR REFF

table.name: TBL_SCORE
table.Comment: Audit trail for each time User get score

table.name: TBL_STAFF_OLD
table.Comment: Data as of 15 Nov Compulsory Field : PERSONNEL_NO,STAFF_NAME,EMAIL,STATE,DESIGNATION,FLAG,STAFF_ID

table.name: TBL_TELEGRAM_ALERT
table.Comment: AUTO NOTIFICATION FROM SYSTEM TO TELEGRAM GCHAT

column.name: CT_ID
column.Comment: CLOSURE_TYPE; REFER TO L_ID FROM TBL_LOV

column.name: SH_ID
column.Comment: STAKEHOLDER_ID = L_ID IN TBL_LOV; DEFAULT VAL = 0 IF TYPE != TRANSFER

column.name: OWNER_ID
column.Comment: AGENT H_ID WHO RESPONSIBLE TO THE CASE

column.name: OWNER_ID_SUPPORT
column.Comment: REQ SUPPORT : Support person is when there is specific personnel identified from the stakeholders team

column.name: CASE_TYPE
column.Comment: A.K.A AREA; FULFILLMENT/ASSURANCE/BILLING/etc; REFER TO L_ID IN TBL_LOV

column.name: PRODUCT_NAME
column.Comment: FIXED/MOBILE/etc ; REFER TO L_ID IN TBL_LOV

column.name: CASE_STATUS
column.Comment: REFER TO L_ID IN TBL_LOV : NEW/ACKNOWLEDGE/IN-PROGRESS/CLOSED

column.name: ELIGIBILITY
column.Comment: LOGGER'S ELIGIBILITY STATUS UPON CASE CREATION

column.name: TEMP
column.Comment: to store SH_ID as a backup before migration

index.name: INDEXING
index.ColNames: C_ID SH_ID CASE_TYPE PRODUCT_NAME CASE_STATUS AREA_LOCATION SERVICE_ID SR_NUM TT_NUM SEGMENT_ID FLAG SOURCE_ID SUB_SOURCE_ID SMS_DESC STAKEHOLDER_REF

index.name: INDEXING
index.ColNames: EMAIL H_TOKEN H_GROUP PASSWORD FULLNAME H_ID LDAP_EMAIL

column.name: C_ID
column.Comment: INNER JOIN TBL_CASE; COUNT ONLY FOR CASE_STATUS != CANCELLED

column.name: CT_ID
column.Comment: CLOSURE_TYPE; REFER TO L_ID FROM TBL_LOV

column.name: O_ID
column.Comment: AGENT H_ID WHO RESPONSIBLE TO THE CASE

column.name: S_ID
column.Comment: REQ SUPPORT : Support person is when there is specific personnel identified from the stakeholders team

column.Comment: A.K.A AREA; FULFILLMENT/ASSURANCE/BILLING/etc; REFER TO L_ID IN TBL_LOV

column.name: CASE_STATUS_ID
column.Comment: REFER TO L_ID IN TBL_LOV : NEW/ACKNOWLEDGE/IN-PROGRESS/CLOSED

column.Comment: CLOSURE_TYPE; REFER TO L_ID FROM TBL_LOV
